text: [Music]
it's a smiley face you see it everywhere
but who invented this little sucker it's
a tricky question
in 1963 graphic artist this man Harvey
Ross ball made the original smiley face
for an American insurance company it
took him just 10 minutes to design and
he didn't bother to copyright it oh oh
but across the Atlantic someone else did
and it made him ecstatic Lee rich he was
Franklin laughs Ronnie the editor of
francois who used the smiley face to
highlight happy news stories in 1972 he
took out copyright on the smiley face in
100 different countries the 1970s was
the feel-good age and the smiley got on
everything from t-shirts mugs and
cushions and everyone who used it had to
pay Franklin smiley company this happy
and nowadays it makes a hundred and
thirty million dollars a year for a
company that started out with only a
cartoon face to sell let it's something
to smile about
[Music]
